resources.string: An app that scores your ability to remember the most recurring image displayed in a series of other images. The images stay on screen for a short period of time before switching unto the next. When the images are done changing, it will stop and take you to a different screen where you will select correctly what image appear the most. Each user has 3 lives to make a mistake. During each round of this game, you will lose a life if you select the wrong image. If you select the correct image, you will increase your overall score which can be added to the scoreboard.
